dialog.name: hello
dialog.message: Hello there, adventurer. I'm {npc.name}, the mage. Are you, like myself, interested in this extraordinary hole?

dialog.name: yes
dialog.message: I see... Well, the hole has appeared quite recently after a strong earthquake hit the area... I dare not go in just yet, but there seems to be a lot of static in the air down there.

dialog.name: static
dialog.message: Yes, electricity... It is quite possible there are the mythical crystals down there.

dialog.name: crystals
dialog.message: The crystals are said to transform air around them into electricity over time, then release the electricity all at once... This is supposedly to give energy to the main crystal, which will also harden, making it nearly impossible to shatter...
